message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find valuable. Given its unique features, I'm offering it to you for $12,000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,500 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I value this product at a higher price point. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to counteroffer at $10,500.
